attributes.action: Reject Brexit if a suitable deal is not agreed on by 31st October
attributes.background: In the future, I would like to have the freedom to move to other European countries and have some of the benefits of trading with the EU has to offer and I am sure many others would too, government, if you cannot find a suitable deal by the 31st of October, reject BREXIT.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269549
